segments.text: This kitchen is turning into a disaster zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is spewing water like a broken fountain.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking the cabinets and creating a slimy puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman just keeps drying her plate, ignoring the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron might get ruined from all that splashing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are making it worse with their climbing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy's stool is filthy from the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's rummaging in the cookie jar like a thief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting with her hand out, greedy little thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies will be stale from the humidity soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole place smells damp already, I bet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn off the water before it's a swimming pool!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden looks clean; why can't the inside be?
segments.speaker: PAR
